body_html: I also think that's fine. It makes sense to require some extra verbosity for factory functions that generally have complicated signatures, but casting is the purpose of this function, and it already has another overload that doesn't require it as a kwarg.

body: I also think that's fine. It makes sense to require some extra verbosity for factory functions that generally have complicated signatures, but casting is the purpose of this function, and it already has another overload that doesn't require it as a kwarg.
